page.title: 12The Village Shop.
page.content: Within the survey area there is one shop a Post Office and General Store in Moreton Morrell. John Davis, the owner, talked to the children. "I don't know how old the shop is. My wife's Grandmother had it before us and she started the shop. "I've been here over twenty years. I don't think the Post Office has changed. I don't think I shall change the shop now." "I don't think the village has changed, apart from a few council houses". "I do enjoy my work. It takes politeness and friendliness to be a good shopkeeper, also quickness." "We do seem busier but I don't know if we have more customers...a lot do criticize my Post Office but not to my face." Mr.&Mrs. Davis also deliver the mail.
